element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm generates a Random DEM based on two parameters that control how the terrain is created.

element.name: RADIUS
element.text: the radius of the working window (in cells), which represents the area modified in each iteration.

element.name: ITERATIONS
element.text: The number of iterations to perform. The larger the number of iterations, the longer it will take to execute the algorithm and the more developed the resulting terrain will be

image.description: New random DEM (radius 100; iterations 500), with an added shadow to give a better effect of the relief.
